chunks.chunk_text: 想知道薪水入帳後該如何管理投資新手又該何時入場出國旅遊怎麼玩追什麼我是蔡尚樺邀請您來收聽玉山銀行全新Podcast玉山學堂在這裡我將和不同世代的來賓一起聊投資談消費分享最實用的理財觀念讓理財不只是數字而是更輕鬆更有趣的生活方式現在就點擊連結收聽一起開啟幸福人生
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 西班牙相關時事趣聞 All about Spain.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello 同情家族歡迎收聽Look Back Sunday在這個節目John老師會彙整過去不同國家與主題的熱門跟讀文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界時事趣聞Let's get right to it
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 西班牙相關時事趣聞 All about Spain.json

chunks.chunk_text: But his isn't your typical rehab programIt's an 11-month boot campto reform corrupt Spanish officialsand reinsert them into mainstream society
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 西班牙相關時事趣聞 All about Spain.json

chunks.chunk_text: Repairing the damageis what is left for me in this lifesaid Albuquerquewho is serving a four-year prison sentencefor stealing around 400,000 eurosnearly 500,000 US dollarsin his work drawing up contracts and deedsOver the course of 32 sessions in an austereconference roomin Cordoba's penitentiaryAlbuquerque will be monitored
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 西班牙相關時事趣聞 All about Spain.json

chunks.chunk_text: by a team of psychiatristsHe will sit for group therapy sessionswith titles likepersonal abilities and valuesHe is in some ways the guinea pigof an experiment meant to answeran age-old questionBury deep in the soul of a swindlerlike Albuquerquemight there be an honest manThat such a program exists in Spainmay say much about the country's belief
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 西班牙相關時事趣聞 All about Spain.json

chunks.chunk_text: As it does about how corruptionhas captured the public imagination hereFlip open a newspaperor turn on the radioYou will hear of schemes, scandals and skullduggeryAngel Luis Ortiz, a former judgewho now runs Spain's prisonssaid the boom-bust cycles of Spain's economyhad led it to a long history of fraudstersand betrayals of the public trust
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 西班牙相關時事趣聞 All about Spain.json

chunks.chunk_text: But at leastcorruption rates in Spainwere no worse than in otherEuropean nationsOrtiz saidJust 5% of all crimesIt was Spain's will to rehabilitatethe offendersthat set it apart from the restOrtiz saidNine prisons are running programsso farwhich began in MarchPrisoners don't get reduced sentencesfor joiningBut officials sayparticipating
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 西班牙相關時事趣聞 All about Spain.json

chunks.chunk_text: is looked unfavorablywhen it comes time torequest paroleYet for all the volunteersOrtiz still thinks his biggestchallengemay be convincingSpain's corrupt officialsthat thereactually might be something wrong with themFor thatthe government turned to Sergio RuizA prison psychiatristwho helpeddesign the programRuiz saidthat in addition to gettingparticipants
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 西班牙相關時事趣聞 All about Spain.json

chunks.chunk_text: to recognizetheir flaws in group therapyinmates would eventually be askedto participatein restorative justice sessionswhere they would askfor forgivenessfrom their victimsNext article

chunks.chunk_text: Colma de Mallorca's Aquarium Marine Rescue Center into action.After initial attempts to cut the net from a boat failed,divers plunged into the sea to remove the mesh with their knives in a daring 45-minute operation.Nicknamed Walls of Death for the quantity of other sea life they catch in addition to the fish they are set for,drift nets were banned by the United Nations 30 years ago.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 西班牙相關時事趣聞 All about Spain.json

chunks.chunk_text: Next article.Spanish engineers extract drinking water from thin air.A Spanish company has devised a system to extract drinking water from thin air to supply arid regions where people are in desperate need.The goal is to help people said Enrique Vega,the 82-year-old engineer who invented the machine during a harsh drought in southern Spain in the
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 西班牙相關時事趣聞 All about Spain.json

chunks.chunk_text: 1990s.The goal is to get to places like refugee camps that don't have drinking water.The devices made by his company,Aquair,are already delivering clean safe water to communities in Namibia and a Lebanese refugee camp.The machines use electricity to cool air until it condenses into water,harnessing the same effect that causes condensation in air conditioning units.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 西班牙相關時事趣聞 All about Spain.json

chunks.chunk_text: Next article.Spain to make some train journeys free from September.Public transport prices on state-owned service across Spain have already been slashed in half in response to rapidly rising energy and inflation rates.Now the government has announced further 100% discounts.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 西班牙相關時事趣聞 All about Spain.json

chunks.chunk_text: Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez has announced that

chunks.chunk_text: some people may be able to travel at time limits or long-distance travels according to public broadcaster TVE.Multi-journey tickets include a minimum of 10 return trips.Next article.Spain horse whispers animal mirror stress sufferers state of mind.In the Gualdalix mountains outside Madrid,Argentine horse whisperer Fernando Noales uses his animals

chunks.chunk_text: 他57岁的女儿在泰国的野兽生活中很多年用猴子作为一种用心去解释和控制自己的情绪的人用猴子的时间去学习猴子的动作,并且学习他们自己的心理状态
